value.title: Download your reports from the Power Bi service (powerbi.com) - Power BI Tips & Tricks #19
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you Microsoft's latest functionality added to the Power BI service (Powerbi.com).  This update was released last week (2016-Nov) and it allows you and your team to download the power bi reports from the service. I also explain why the functionality is not always enabled.   Looking

value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code.
